meta.title: Maine Virtual School for Online 7-12 | MCA Connections Academy

meta.name: DESCRIPTION
meta.content: Maine Connections Academy is a public online school serving students in grades 7-12. Explore our tuition-free Maine virtual school today.

a.title: For enrollment help, call us now at 1-800-382-6010

br.p: This website is not compatible with Internet Explorer 8 or below. Please upgrade to the latest version here. This link will open in a new window.

div.p: Maine Connections Academy is not just a fully accredited online school. It's a tight-knit school community offering all the services and resources needed to create a well-rounded student experience.

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

br.p: Students throughout Maine are thriving at Maine Connections Academy, a tuition-free online public school. Maine Connections Academy gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.

div.p: Events are great ways to learn more

div.blockquote: All kids learn differently. Online school will teach your kids how to be themselves, and they will soar!
What I like most about MCA is that I can learn at my own pace and balance school with my passion: surfing.

div.p: School leader Walter Wallace gives families tips on how to turn distance learning into success
Josselyn Green named STAR Student of the Month for February
Caroline Santaguida uses flexibility of virtual school to balance schoolwork, figure skating schedule

ul.li: Maine Connections Academy is accredited by the North Central Association Commission Accreditation and School Improvement (NCA CASI), an accrediting division of Cognia, formerly AdvancED.
Nearly 96% of MCA parents agree that the Connections Academy curriculum is high quality. View our parent survey results.
Download the School Profile for Maine Connections Academy

img.alt: A group of teens pose on a ski slope in ski gear

div.p: Pursuant to our charter, we are required to inform you of other full-time virtual charter schools in the state. Please contact Maine Virtual Academy at 877-463-6198.
